com.groupstp.workflowstp.rest.controller

Interface WorkflowRestAPI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WorkflowRestController

    @RequestMapping(value="/workflow",
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public interface WorkflowRestAPI
    Workflow REST endpoint API

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • getWorkflows

        @GetMapping(value="/all")
java.util.List<WorkflowDTO> getWorkflows()
        Get all active workflows from system
        Returns:
        all visible to user and ready to use workflows

      • start

        @PostMapping(value="/start")
ResponseDTO<java.lang.String> start(@RequestParam(name="entityId")
                                                                  java.lang.String entityId,
                                                                  @RequestParam(name="entityName")
                                                                  java.lang.String entityName)
        Start workflow process
        Parameters:
        entityId - processing entity id
        entityName - processing entity name (like bo$Entity)
        Returns:
        id of created workflow instance

      • isProcessing

        @GetMapping(value="/processing")
ResponseDTO<java.lang.String> isProcessing(@RequestParam(name="entityId")
                                                                             java.lang.String entityId,
                                                                             @RequestParam(name="entityName")
                                                                             java.lang.String entityName)
        Check is send entity in workflow process or not
        Parameters:
        entityId - processing entity id
        entityName - processing entity name (like bo$Entity)
        Returns:
        is provided entity in workflow process or not (also returning id of workflow instance if entity is processing)

      • isPerformable

        @GetMapping(value="/performable")
ResponseDTO<ResultDTO> isPerformable(@RequestParam(name="entityId")
                                                                        java.lang.String[] entityId,
                                                                        @RequestParam(name="workflowId")
                                                                        java.lang.String workflowId,
                                                                        @RequestParam(name="stepId")
                                                                        java.lang.String stepId,
                                                                        @RequestParam(name="actionId")
                                                                        java.lang.String[] actionId)
        Check can current user perform workflow action of the specified entities
        Parameters:
        entityId - performing entities ids
        workflowId - current processing workflow id
        stepId - processing step id
        actionId - performing actions ids
        Returns:
        is provided user can perform actions to the specified entities or not (with flags actionId-result)

      • perform

        @PostMapping(value="/perform",
             consumes="application/json")
ResponseDTO<java.lang.String> perform(@RequestParam(name="entityId")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String[] entityId,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(name="workflowId")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String workflowId,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(name="stepId")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String stepId,
                                                                                                                 @RequestParam(name="actionId")
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String actionId,
                                                                                                                 @RequestBody
                                                                                                                 java.lang.String payload)
        Perform provided action with current user for specified entities
        Parameters:
        entityId - performing entities ids
        workflowId - current processing workflow id
        stepId - processing step id
        actionId - performing action id
        payload - special payload message which can contains business logic data
        Returns:
        result of the performing
